org.corfudb.runtime.view

Class RuntimeLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.view.RuntimeLayout

  • public class RuntimeLayout
extends Object
    This is a wrapper over the layout to provide the clients required to communicate with the nodes.

    Created by zlokhandwala on 3/8/18.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor taking a reference of the layout to stamp the clients.

    • Method Detail

      • moveServersToEpoch

        public void moveServersToEpoch()
                        throws WrongEpochException,
                               QuorumUnreachableException
        Attempts to move all servers in the system to the epoch of this layout. The seal however waits only for a response from a quorum of layout servers (n/2 + 1), a quorum of log unit servers in every stripe in case of QUORUM_REPLICATION or at least one log unit server in every stripe in case of CHAIN_REPLICATION.
        Throws:
        WrongEpochException - If any server is in a higher epoch.
        QuorumUnreachableException - If enough number of servers cannot be sealed.
